title: Amazon KDP Book Research 2025 | Find Profitable Niches & Keywords (Beginner Friendly)

tactics.name: Amazon Best Sellers + Royalties Calculator
tactics.description: Identify trending books by checking Amazon's bestseller list and validating sales data with the royalties calculator.
steps: Go to Amazon books best sellers and select a category.
Scroll to find a bestseller with a low BSR (e.g., #236).
Use Amazon royalties calculator to confirm daily sales (e.g., 438 books/day).
caveats: Avoid outdated books with high competition
source_quotes: "This book has 438 books per day being sold."

heuristics.name: Keyword Competition Filter
heuristics.condition: If keyword competition exceeds 2,000, avoid the niche.
source_quotes: "Always be sure that any book you're going for doesn't have a competition of more than 1,000 or 2,000 people."

claims.statement: A book ranked #236 on Amazon's bestseller list sells 438 books per day.
source_quotes: "This book has 438 books per day being sold."

niche_patterns.description: Combine broad categories with specific audience pain points.
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Leverages existing bestseller trends with targeted solutions.
source_quotes: "Choose whichever one you want to go with. You might want to write cookbooks, health and fitness, anyone you want."
